# UITextInputDelegate

**Protocol**

An intermediary between a document and the text input system.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor protocol UITextInputDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

A [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInputDelegate] conveys notifications of pending or transpired changes in text and selection in the document. UIKit provides a private text input delegate, which it assigns at runtime to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInput/inputDelegate] property of the object whose class adopts the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInput] protocol.

## Notifying the delegate of textual changes

- **textWillChange(_:)**: Tells the input delegate when text is about to change in the document.
- **textDidChange(_:)**: Tells the input delegate when text has changed in the document.

## Notifying the delegate of selection changes

- **selectionWillChange(_:)**: Tells the input delegate when the selection is about to change in the document.
- **selectionDidChange(_:)**: Tells the input delegate when the selection has changed in the document.

## Notifying the delegate of conversation changes

- **conversationContext(_:didChange:)**: Tells the input delegate when text has changed in the input object for a conversation.

## Text input

- **UITextInput**: A set of methods for interacting with the text input system and enabling features in documents.
- **UIKeyInput**: A set of methods a responder uses to implement simple text entry.
- **UITextInputTraits**: A set of methods that defines features for keyboard input to a text object.
- **UITextInputContext**: An object that reports the type of input your app receives.
- **UITextInputMode**: The current text input mode.
- **UITextInputAssistantItem**: An object that manages custom bar button items that you add to the shortcuts bar above the keyboard on iPad.
- **UIDictationPhrase**: An object that represents the textual interpretation of a spoken phrase that the user dictates.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

## Conforming Types

- UIInputViewController
